channel.description: Recent content in LiDAR on Fuwei's Tech Notes

item.title: LiDAR Extrinsic Parameter Adjustment for SLAM Recalibration
item.description: Mathematical framework for recalibrating SLAM poses and maps when LiDAR extrinsic parameters change, without rerunning the entire SLAM process while preserving annotations.

item.title: Bundle Adjustment for LiDAR SLAM: Mathematical Formulation and Optimization
item.description: A comprehensive mathematical treatment of bundle adjustment for LiDAR SLAM, covering problem formulation, feature parameter elimination, and optimization.

item.title: LiDAR-SLAM Decoded: From Point Clouds to Precision Maps
item.description: An in-depth tutorial on Simultaneous Localization and Mapping (SLAM), covering its fundamental concepts, real-world applications, and key challenges.
